name: Switch CoLoRs (itch)
description:
Hello

I hope you enjoy playing game more then i did enjoy doing it :3

Pliz play in full screen I wanted to make in WebGL for easy access.

This is my best game i have made yet and second GameJam :D

If you have some suggestion's pliz live them in comment I really want some feed back and if you get this far thank you for visiting this small project that means allot to me <3
